Complete Examples

Source: vignettes/articles/complete-examples.Rmd
complete-examples.Rmd
library(ggalign)
#> Loading required package: ggplot2

Let’s prepare some example data.

set.seed(123)
small_mat <- matrix(rnorm(72), nrow = 9)
rownames(small_mat) <- paste0("row", seq_len(nrow(small_mat)))
colnames(small_mat) <- paste0("column", seq_len(ncol(small_mat)))

Simple heatmap 

ggheatmap(small_mat) + scale_fill_viridis_c()
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`

heatmap layout customize

Based on dendrogram 

ggheatmap(small_mat) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c() +
    anno_top() +
    align_dendro(aes(color = branch), k = 3) +
    geom_point(aes(color = branch, y = y)) +
    scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2")
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`

Based on kmeans 

ggheatmap(small_mat) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c() +
    anno_top() +
    align_kmeans(3L)
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`

Based on a group variable 

ggheatmap(small_mat) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c() +
    anno_top() +
    align_group(sample(letters[1:4], ncol(small_mat), replace = TRUE))
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`

Based on an ordering weights

Here, we ordered the heatmap rows based on the row means.

ggheatmap(small_mat) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c() +
    anno_left() +
    align_order(rowMeans)
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`

Heatmap annotation plot 

ggheatmap(small_mat) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c() +
    anno_top() +
    align_dendro(aes(color = branch), k = 3) +
    geom_point(aes(color = branch, y = y)) +
    scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
    ggalign(aes(y = value)) +
    geom_boxplot(aes(factor(.x), fill = .panel)) +
    scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2")
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`

ggheatmap(small_mat) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c() +
    anno_top(size = 0.5) +
    align_dendro(aes(color = branch), k = 3L) +
    ggalign(aes(y = value), data = rowSums) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", aes(fill = factor(.panel))) +
    scale_fill_brewer(name = NULL, palette = "Dark2") +
    anno_left(size = 0.5) +
    align_dendro(aes(color = branch), size = 0.5, k = 4L) +
    ggalign(aes(x = value), data = rowSums) +
    geom_bar(
        aes(y = .y, fill = factor(.y)),
        stat = "identity",
        orientation = "y"
    ) +
    scale_fill_brewer(name = NULL, palette = "Paired", guide = "none")
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`

Multiple heatmaps

Horizontal layout 

(ggstack(small_mat, "h") +
    ggheatmap() +
    ggheatmap() &
    scale_fill_viridis_c() &
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -60, hjust = 0))) +
    stack_active() +
    align_dendro(aes(color = branch), k = 4L, size = 0.2) +
    scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2")
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`

Vertical layout 

ggstack(small_mat, "v") -
    plot_theme(axis.text.x = element_blank()) +
    align_dendro(aes(color = branch), k = 4L, size = 0.2) +
    scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
    ggheatmap() +
    ggheatmap() &
    scale_fill_viridis_c() &
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -60, hjust = 0))
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`
#> → heatmap built with `geom_tile()`

marginal plots 

ggside(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) -
    # set default theme for all plots in the layout
    plot_theme(theme_bw()) +
    geom_point(size = 2) +
    anno_top(size = 0.3) -
    # set default theme for the top annotation
    plot_theme(theme_no_axes("tb")) +
    ggfree() +
    geom_density(aes(displ, y = after_stat(density), colour = class), position = "stack") +
    anno_right(size = 0.3) -
    # set default theme for the right annotation
    plot_theme(theme_no_axes("lr")) +
    ggfree() +
    geom_density(aes(x = after_stat(density), hwy, colour = class),
        position = "stack"
    ) +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = .5))
